views.markdown:
- Updated app to support iOS 11 - Updated donation links Fixed crashing bug with Pikachu's down B attack

- fixed issue with game freezing at the end of a match

- added Link
- many many many bug fixes
- Added Pikachu as a character
- Added version checking to bluetooth (gives you a warning if the versions are not the same)
- Other bug fixes
-Bluetooth support for 2 players to play wireless
-fixed phone lock freeze bug
-fixed bug that loaded extra characters on training mode
-fixed bug with Hyrule Temple not playing music
-numerous other bug fixes and tweaks
- fixed issue with sound and music not loading
- added base code to begin work on Bluetooth Support (Bluetooth Support will be available very soon!)

- complete rewrite of the entire app
- major optimizations
- Camera pans and Zooms
- Preferences save to /User/Library/Preferences folder
- new stage added
- Termina: Great Bay stage removed
-Fox is now a playable character
-crazy gravity glitch fixed.
-sticky ceiling fixed
-crash on older gen devices fixed
-improved AI
